Description: The field 'apikey' will contain your authentication key (obtained from http://dev.elsevier.com).
The field 'insttoken' will contain your institution token provided by Elsevier support staff.
The field 'api_uses_nb' is automatically incremented after each api request using the module api_manager of the package ScopusApyJson.
The '.gitignore' file lists 'api_scopus_config.json' as a file to be ignored.
After the past of your APIKEY and your INSTTOKEN, save the 'api_scopus_config.json' in a password protected environment to be kept secure server-side.
